ygData.subject: Re: Magic Footwear.
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe every special attack beyond the basic kick (ie Round Kick on) is considered magical.. WGR ... From: Chris  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I believe every special attack beyond the basic kick (ie Round Kick on) is
considered magical..

WGR
----- Original Message -----
From: Chris <drtns@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 06, 1999 4:17 PM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Magic Footwear.


> From: Chris <drtns@...>
>
>
> Sice we are talking Magic Gloves are there any magic footwear that will

but

netted,
